A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Completely out of character for Luke and Leia. Luke has never been a whiny coward afraid to protect those he loves. Just wrong! Lots of different plots and loose ends everywhere like the most powerful Sith in the galaxy randomly getting killed. Best scene in the movie was the last 3 minutes when a little orphan boy working in a stable reaches out for a broom and it FLIES into his hand. The light still lives!
